title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Community Mathematics Education Design Applying Organizational Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic experience in organizational activities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can explain core concepts of organizational learning theory and apply them to solving community issues.
Participants can analyze organizational contexts arising during mathematical problem-solving processes through team-based projects.
Participants can design practical strategies to improve educational effectiveness using a critical realism approach.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
